response.overview: "The Weight of Kaarmah" follows the life of a woman, Emily, who was abandoned as a child by her mother, Laura, to protect her from the dark world of human trafficking. Laura, desperate to shield her daughter from the same fate she endured, leaves Emily in the care of a man with a criminal past, who promises to keep her safe. As Emily grows up, she struggles with feeli...
response.title: The Weight of Kaarmah
